zeppelin_install.html.title: 다운로드 & 설치
zeppelin_install.html.body: 다운로드 & 설치다운로드 & 설치 wget http://apache.mirror.cdnetworks.com/zeppelin/zeppelin-0.8.2/zeppelin-0.8.2-bin-all.tgz tar xvf zeppelin-0.8.2-bin-all.tgz mv zeppelin-0.8.2-bin-all /opt/zeppelin-0.8.2 chown -R hdfs:hadoop /opt/zeppelin profile.d 에 등록 export "ZEPPELIN_HOME=/opt/zeppelin-0.8.2" >> /etc/profile.d/zeppelin.sh export "HADOOP_CONF_DIR=/opt/hadoop-2.7.7/etc/hadoop" >> /etc/profile.d/zeppelin.sh export "PATH=$PATH:$ZEPPELIN_HOME/bin" >> /etc/profile.d/zeppelin.sh 주요 설정 입력 echo "export ZEPPELIN_ADDR=centos-namenode-1" >> ZEPPELIN_HOME/conf/zeppelin-env.sh echo "export ZEPPELIN_PROT=8889" >> ZEPPELIN_HOME/conf/zeppelin-env.sh echo "export SPARK_HOME=/opt/spark-2.4.4" >> ZEPPELIN_HOME/conf/zeppelin-env.sh

zeppelin_user.html.title: 유저 생성
zeppelin_user.html.body: 유저 생성실행유저 생성 cp $ZEPPELIN_HOME/conf/shiro.ini.template $ZEPPELIN_HOME/conf/shiro.ini vim $ZEPPELIN_HOME/conf/shiro.ini [users] admin = admin, admin hdfs = hdfs, admin 실행 zeppelin-daemon.sh start 접속 URL http://[ip].8889 works!!
